description:
### 12.15 sobel_opencl

Apply the Sobel operator (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sobel_operator) to input video stream.


The filter accepts the following option:


- **`planes`**
  - Set which planes to filter. Default value is
0xf
, by which all planes are processed.
- **`scale`**
  - Set value which will be multiplied with filtered result.
Range is
[0.0, 65535]
and default value is
1.0
.
- **`delta`**
  - Set value which will be added to filtered result.
Range is
[-65535, 65535]
and default value is
0.0
.
Set which planes to filter. Default value is 0xf, by which all planes are processed.


Set value which will be multiplied with filtered result.
Range is [0.0, 65535] and default value is 1.0.


Set value which will be added to filtered result.
Range is [-65535, 65535] and default value is 0.0.
name: sobel_opencl

options.description: Set which planes to filter. Default value is 0xf, by which all planes are processed.

options.description: Set value which will be multiplied with filtered result. Range is [0.0, 65535] and default value is 1.0.

options.description: Set value which will be added to filtered result. Range is [-65535, 65535] and default value is 0.0.
options.name: delta
